thread.title: Ford are offering customers a flux capacitor upgrade that's Back To The Future come to life - Fun
thread.title_full: Ford are offering customers a flux capacitor upgrade that's Back To The Future come to life - Fun News - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Ford are offering customers a flux capacitor upgrade that's Back To The Future come to life - Fun
text: Get ready to hit speeds of 88 mph, because Ford has joined in on the Back to the Future anniversary fun.The motoring company is offering customers a flux capacitor upgrade, although it is for "recreational use only"."Interfering in major historical events is illegal and could have unintended consequences for all of humanity," the fun video states.And if you weren't already aware: "Avoid your past self at all costs, as this could potentially cause a rift in the space-time continuum."Powered, of course, by 1.21 gigawatts, the upgrade will definitely not be available from October 21. Â© Universal PicturesMichael J. Fox and Christopher Lloyd in Back to the Future Earlier this month, Pepsi announced that Back to the Future 2's parody product Pepsi Perfect will be available to buy, while Universal released a 'Jaws 19' trailer.Hoverboard pioneers Arx Pax have also confirmed they will formally showcase their second-generation Hendo Hoverboard on October 21.
